name: Move Forward (itch)
description:
The goal in Move Forward is to clear each stage of every tile, while also managing to return to the starting point. Players can move one tile in each direction (up, down, left, right), also beware of trap !

Control :

Swipe your tile with your mouse up, down, left or right 

Note: Right now, this game is still in early development and only has 10 Level. I will update it with more level, music and many more soon.
